name: Astrocats VS Cowtopus
description:
Fear the stupidity of the Cowtopus swarm ! Astrocats planet is in danger, let's fight the invader with our throwing furball Purret !

Astrocats VS Cowtopus is a 3D tower defense game done by Hellion Cat studio in a one week gamejam (and few dev weeks of cleaning it)

Let's fight for more 'Maw' and less 'Moh' ! Let's try it and give us your feedback.
